line_1: Descend some twice or thrice a-day:
line_2: And your good-natur'd Gods, They say,

line_1: And the fond Beau loves his half score aday,
line_2: The Ladies too almost as Vain as they;
Neptune must straight be sent to Sea;

line_1: He turn'd and he varied full ten times a-day;
line_2: With no reason on earth to go out of his way,
